welcome: Welcome to your Personal Finance App!
description: Your third eye in your pocket for money management.
transaction_save_error_fields: Please fill in all required fields (Amount, Category, Date).
transactions_page_description: View and manage all your financial transactions.
no_transactions_yet: No transactions recorded yet. Add your first one!
analytics_page_description: Gain insights into your spending and income patterns.
analytics_content_placeholder: Charts and graphs will appear here.
goals_page_description: Set and track your financial goals.
no_goals_yet: No financial goals set yet. Start planning your future!
additional_insights_placeholder: More detailed analytics and reports will be available here.
goal_name_placeholder: e.g., Save for a new car
goal_save_error_fields: Please fill in the goal name and a valid target amount.
transaction_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
goal_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this goal? This action cannot be undone.
budgets_page_description: Set and track your spending limits for different categories.
budget_save_error_fields: Please fill in all required fields (Category, Amount, Month, Year).
no_budgets_yet: No budgets set yet. Start managing your spending!
budget_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this budget? This action cannot be undone.
no_transactions_found: No transactions found matching your criteria.
recommendation_add_first_transaction: Start by adding your first transaction to get personalized insights!
recommendation_great_savings: Great job managing your finances! Your net savings are looking strong this month. Keep up the fantastic work!
recommendation_positive_savings: You're building positive net savings this month! Every little bit counts, keep an eye on your spending to boost it further.
recommendation_high_expenses: It looks like expenses are a bit high this month. Let's review your transactions and find ways to get back on track!
recommendation_over_budget: You've gone over your {{category}} budget this month. Perhaps it's time to adjust or find alternatives?
recommendation_under_budget: Excellent work staying well within your {{category}} budget this month! Consider allocating the surplus to savings or another goal.
recommendation_unused_budget: You have an unused budget for {{category}}. Is this category still relevant, or could you reallocate these funds?
recommendation_goal_almost_reached: You're so close to achieving your goal of '{{goalName}}'! Keep up the fantastic work, the finish line is in sight!
recommendation_goal_good_progress: You're making great progress towards '{{goalName}}'! Your dedication is paying off.
recommendation_goal_start_strong: Starting a new goal is exciting! Keep contributing to '{{goalName}}' to build momentum.
recommendation_general_positive: You're doing a wonderful job managing your finances! Keep up the great work.
income_page_description: Track and manage all your income sources.
income_save_error_fields: Please fill in all required fields (Amount, Type, Date).
no_income_yet: No income recorded yet. Add your first income!
income_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this income entry? This action cannot be undone.
add_transaction_page_description: Record your income and expenses to keep track of your money.
no_budgets_for_current_month: No budgets set for the current month. Create one to start tracking!
no_active_goals: No active savings goals. Set a new goal to start saving!
error_not_authenticated: You must be logged in to perform this action.
